publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6275.1 Elaine Murray: Zero Waste Plan—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6275) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "and to address the concerns raised in the Audit Scotland report, Protecting and improving Scotland’s environment, that councils need additional waste management facilities to meet national and landfill recycling targets." Supported by: Sarah Boyack*
